A

AudioClipManager - class AudioClipManager.
This class can be used to avoid playing two audio clips at the same time.
AudioClipManager() - Constructor for class AudioClipManager
This private constructor is defined so the compiler won't generate a default public constructor.

G

getInstance() - Static method in class AudioClipManager
Return a reference to the only instance of this class.

L

lifeLine - Static variable in class ObjectPreserver
 
loop() - Method in class AudioClipManager
Starts playing this audio clip in a loop.
loop(AudioClip) - Method in class AudioClipManager
Stop the previously requested audio clip and play the given audio clip in a loop.

M

Main - class Main.
 
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
 
myInstance - Static variable in class AudioClipManager
 

O

ObjectPreserver - class ObjectPreserver.
This class has methods to ensure that an object is never garbage collected.
ObjectPreserver() - Constructor for class ObjectPreserver
Constructor.

P

play() - Method in class AudioClipManager
Start playing this audio clip.
play(AudioClip) - Method in class AudioClipManager
Stop the previously requested audio clip and play the given audio clip.
preserveObject(Object) - Static method in class ObjectPreserver
Garbage collection of objects passed to this method will be prevented until they are passed to the unpreserveObject method.
prevClip - Variable in class AudioClipManager
 
protectedSet - Static variable in class ObjectPreserver
 

R

run() - Method in class ObjectPreserver
 

S

stop() - Method in class AudioClipManager
Stops playing this audio clip.

U

unpreserveObject(Object) - Static method in class ObjectPreserver
Objects passed to this method lose the protection that the preserveObject method gave them from garbage collection.
